description: This is the track I used to go see a 20 foot waterfall on the little meander river.  there are some ATV trails that lead there but I prefered to follow the river upstream to save time.
directions: Highway 101 towards Wolfville.  Take the St Croix exit (highway 1).  Take highway 1 towards Newport Corner and continue.  Turn left on highway 215 towards Borrklyn and turn right on McKay Rd.  Drive about 5.5km until you cross little meander river.  Head upstream for about 1.5km to fall.
title: Little Meander River Fall
